name: Lovecraft's Untold Stories
description: Lovecraftâ€™s Untold Stories is an action roguelite with RPG elements. Explore randomly generated levels based in Lovecraft's stories, fight cultists and all kinds of monsters from the Mythos, improve your gear, solve puzzles, and find clues and knowledge to defeat the Great Old Ones.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 10 Processor: Dual Core CPU 2ghz or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 3000 GPU / AMD HD 5450 / Nvidia 9400 GT DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2000 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0C Compatible
